edu.jhu.hlt.concrete.serialization

Interface ThriftSerializer<T extends org.apache.thrift.TBase<T,? extends org.apache.thrift.TFieldIdEnum>>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CommunicationSerializer, CommunicationTarGzSerializer, CommunicationTarSerializer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoundedThriftSerializer, CompactCommunicationSerializer, TarCompactCommunicationSerializer, TarGzCompactCommunicationSerializer, ThreadSafeThriftSerializer

    public interface ThriftSerializer<T extends org.apache.thrift.TBase<T,? extends org.apache.thrift.TFieldIdEnum>>
    Interface for de/serialization of 'thrift-like' objects. These objects are Java classes that are produced from Apache Thrift.

    • Method Summary
